name: Tiny Memoria
description:
Adventurous RPG of cute girls! (medium to long)

[Play time]
5-10 hours or more

【overview】
Four girls adventure in dungeons and confront monsters.
Earn gold by exploring dungeons, strengthen your equipment and challenge monsters!

You can earn gold each time you repeat the adventure, and you can strengthen your character more and more.
In addition, you can freely change a wide variety of skills to customize your character to your liking.
Overcome the ever-changing battle situation with strategy and tactics!

Even more powerful enemies await after clearing the main story, so be sure to challenge them!

You can play comfortably even with a smartphone ♪

[Idle game elements]
Every 30 minutes, you can get an item that allows you to skip the battle in the dungeon exploration.
Time will pass even if you are not playing the game, so start the game during your free time and get useful items!
In addition, once every 3 hours, a super special bonus!
